description: BajanWheels Ltd is shaping Barbados' future transit network by providing a public transit companion platform. The company offers real-time updates, seamless payments, and a safer commute for public transportation users in Barbados.
business_model: B2C and B2B platform providing digital transit solutions, likely monetized through transaction fees, partnerships with transit authorities, and value-added services.
target_customer: Commuters and public transit users in Barbados, as well as local transit authorities seeking digital solutions.
mission_statement: Shaping Barbados' future transit network and providing a safer, more efficient public transportation experience.
